bibl.title: Orestes in a Temple.
bibl.note: The name of Orestes in an oval frame (similar to a royal cartouche?) on a sandstone block from the basilica situated within the temple precinct of Dendera. The graffito was probably carved by Orestes, praefectus Augustalis of Egypt (A.D. 412 - 415/416).
bibl.seg: LUKASZEWICZ Adam, Orestes in a Temple.

The name of Orestes in an oval frame (similar to a royal cartouche?) on a sandstone block from the basilica situated within the temple precinct of Dendera. The graffito was probably carved by Orestes, praefectus Augustalis of Egypt (A.D. 412 - 415/416).
